comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: I *think* this is the future Umberto II, the last King of Italy. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Umberto_II_of_Italy

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
captainslack:  

We have another copy of this photograph (in a different collection) which has not been digitized, and it is identified as the future Umberto II, so we can add that information to this record. Thanks for the heads up!
